title: Fair play
creator_credit: Edmund Penney, Jack Wipper and Sterling Educational Films
brief_description: The film encourages judgements on three situations which occur in play. The experiences of the playground are important social lessons. Sharing, kindness and responsibility for each other’s well being are some of the elements of “fair play”.
creator_credit_for_label: Edmund Penney, Jack Wipper and Sterling Educational Films
